comment.text: This translation key describes the default signing algorithm used by an Identity Provider. It is displayed as a label in a combo box used to select or configure this setting in the Single Sign-On settings page.

usage.context:
<CheckboxSet prefix={prefix} />
 
 {provider === "IdentityProvider" ? (
 <SsoComboBox
 isDisabled={isDisabledIdpSigning}
 labelText={t("idpSigningAlgorithm")}
 name="idpVerifyAlgorithm"
 options={verifyAlgorithmsOptions}
 tabIndex={14}
 value={idpVerifyAlgorithm}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'الخوارزمية الافتراضية للتحقق من تسجيل الدخول' while technically accurate, is a bit literal and could be improved to sound more natural in Saudi Arabic. 'Sign Verifying Algorithm' implies a process; 'التحقق من تسجيل الدخول' (verification of login) focuses more on the *result* of the verification, not the process itself. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the signing process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الخوارزمية الافتراضية لتوقيع تسجيل الدخول (Al-khwarizmiya al-iftiradiya li-tawqi' tasjeel al-dukool)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Defolt' is a misspelling of 'Default'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Default

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Стандартно зададен алгоритъм за проверка на подписи' is a bit too literal and doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm'. 'Default' implies a setting or a pre-configured option, which isn't fully conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Алгоритъм за проверка на подписи по подразбиране

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Standardmäßiger Algorithmus zur Überprüfung der Unterschrift' is technically correct, it's a bit literal and clunky. 'Default' implies something more straightforward than 'Standardmäßiger'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Optimale Übersetzung wäre 'Standard-Überprüfungsalgorithmus' oder 'Standard-Signatur-Verifizierungsalgorithmus'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Algoritmo de verificación de firma" while technically correct, doesn't fully convey the nuance of 'Default'. It implies just *any* signature verification algorithm, not the one that's used by default.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritmo de verificación de firma predeterminado

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Oletusmerkkien varmistusalgoritmi' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm'. 'Merkit' refers to 'signs' or 'characters,' while the English phrase implies a signing algorithm used for authentication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be 'Oletus allekirjoitusvarmistusalgoritmi' or 'Oletus varmenteen varmistusalgoritmi'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Algorithme de vérification du signe par défaut " is not a direct or natural translation of "Default Sign Verifying Algorithm". While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be something like "Algorithme de vérification de signature par défaut".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algorithme de vérification de signature par défaut

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase includes an unnecessary space before 'par défaut'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algorithme de vérification de signature par défaut

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Նախնական նշանի ստուգման ալգորիթմ" while technically correct, is a bit literal and potentially clunky. "Նախնական" (Initial) doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of "Default" in this context. 'Default' implies a pre-selected or standard option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Ստանդարտ նշանի ստուգման ալգորիթմ" (Standard Sign Verifying Algorithm) or "Նախապես ընտրված նշանի ստուգման ալգորիթմ" (Pre-selected Sign Verifying Algorithm).  The best option will depend on the specific tone desired.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Algoritmo predefinito per la verifica dei segni' is not a direct or natural equivalent of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm.' While technically correct, it's a bit clunky and doesn't convey the meaning as smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritmo di verifica delle firme predefinito

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຂັ້ນຕອນການຢືນຢັນການເຊັນເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' translates to 'Initial Sign Verification Procedure'. It doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm'.  'Default' implies a pre-selected or standard algorithm, which is not captured in the Lao translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translations like 'ວິທີການຢືນຢັນການເຊັນຕາມການຕັ້ງຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' (Initial Default Setting Verification Method) or 'ວິທີການຢືນຢັນການເຊັນເລີ່ມຕົ້ນແບບຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' (Default Initial Sign Verification Method).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation "Algoritmo de Verificação Predefinido para a Verificação dos logins" is overly verbose and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Default Sign Verifying Algorithm."  The phrase "para a Verificação dos logins" is redundant and unnecessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritmo de Verificação Padrão

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly more formal tone than the English, which might not be desirable depending on the overall style guide. 'Padrão' is a more casual synonym for 'Default' in this context than 'Predefinido'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed if a more formal tone is desired, but consider 'Padrão' for greater consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Algoritm implicit de verificare a semnături" doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of "Default Sign Verifying Algorithm". "Implicit" suggests the algorithm is hidden or assumed, which isn't the intended meaning of 'default'. The word 'semnături' should be 'semnătură' to agree in number.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritm implicit de verificare a semnăturii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Algoritm implicit de verificare a semnături' lacks proper grammatical flow. The article 'a' is correct but the word order could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritm implicit de verificare a semnăturii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Стандартный алгоритм проверки подписи:' doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm'. 'Default' implies a setting or configuration, which isn't entirely conveyed by 'Стандартный'. A better translation might include 'Предпочтительный' or 'Основной' to better represent the 'Default' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предпочтительный алгоритм проверки подписи:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඇල්ගොරිතම' (algorithm) is spelled correctly, but its usage might be slightly less common in everyday Sinhala. A more familiar term might enhance readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more commonly used term for 'algorithm' if the target audience isn't technically inclined. Perhaps a paraphrase focusing on the concept of verification.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'පෙරනිමි' (peranimai) translates to 'default', the nuance of 'Default' as in a system setting or configuration might be better conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'සාමාන්‍ය' (samaanya - common/normal) or 'පද්ධතිsetDefault' (paddathi default - system default) to better capture the technical meaning of 'Default'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Predvolený algoritmus na overenie podpisu" is a literal translation but lacks the nuance of 'verifying'. A more accurate and natural translation would emphasize the validation aspect of the algorithm.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Predvolený algoritmus na validáciu podpisu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Privzeti algoritem za preverjanje znakov' while technically correct, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm'. 'Sign' is being used in the context of digital signatures, which isn't directly apparent in the Slovenian translation. A more accurate translation might emphasize this aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Privzeti algoritem za preverjanje digitalnih podpisov

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Подразумевани алгоритам за проверу потписа' is understandable, it's a bit literal and not the most natural phrasing. 'Default' implies a standard or common setting, which isn't fully captured by 'Подразумевани'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'Стандардни алгоритам за верификацију потписа' (Standard algorithm for signature verification) or 'Обични алгоритам за потврду потписа' (Common algorithm for signature confirmation).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Podrazumevani algoritam za proveru potpisa" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Default Sign Verifying Algorithm'. While technically correct, it sounds a bit clunky in Serbian. 'Default' implies a setting or option, which isn't clearly conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Algoritam za verifikaciju potpisa po defaultu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Алгоритм перевірки знаку за замовчуванням" is a bit literal and doesn't flow as naturally as possible. 'Sign' can be interpreted as a signature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Алгоритм перевірки підпису за замовчуванням

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Thuật toán Xác minh Ký tên Mặc định" is a literal translation and doesn't fully capture the nuance of "Default Sign Verifying Algorithm." While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Vietnamese.  'Sign Verifying Algorithm' could be better conveyed as something like 'Thuật toán xác minh chữ ký' or 'Thuật toán xác thực chữ ký'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thuật toán xác minh chữ ký mặc định

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ký tên" is a bit clunky. While it conveys the meaning of 'sign', a more natural flow is preferred.  It breaks the flow of the Vietnamese sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Removed and integrated into surrounding text.
